About Us

This footer serves to update scanfcode's pen "Footer template" which I recently came across while looking for a starting block of code. I wanted a CSS Grid footer and instead of searching through the rest of the results, thought I'd use scanfcode's layout and add a sprinkle of CSS Grid.
